story.text: Jan 3 Quovadx Inc. QVDX.O said it agreed to pay $7.8 million to settle a class action lawsuit that arose from its 2004 restatement of financial results. Quovadx will pay the amount by Jan. 15 into a settlement fund established by the lead plaintiffs' counsel in exchange for a release with prejudice of all claims that were or could have been asserted, it said in a statement. The software company said it expects an additional settlement expense of $4.5 million, or about 11 cents a share, in the fourth quarter. It had previously estimated about 8 cents a share as the settlement amount in the first quarter of 2006. (Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: quovadx settles shareholder lawsuit for $ 7 . 8 mln
